summary: A college student faces down school bullies while competing in track and field.

reviews.content: In my opinion SOTY 2 is the best because if also the movie is not up to the mark for most of the viewers, it has produced two most gorgeous actresses I've ever seen till now... ❤️❤️ I really love Tara Sutaria! 💫💕 I'm a die hard fan of her talent 🎶👏🏽🙌🏽👌🏽👌🏽and Ananya Panday is also very cute and beautiful.

It's a comedy movie with nothing funny not a good humor, I don't laugh at any single scene, this is my life's worst experience if there is a rating of 0 stars then I should preferred that rating because this movie deserve this.
Such a trash movie with no connection to reality. Movies like these make kids dumb these days.

Only The Silly Tiger Shroff Fan's Can Watch This Torture..... It's A Complete Disappointment For All People.... The Worsted Movie I Ever Seen, No Sense, Complete Torture, We Can't Watch This Movie For Any Perpose, I Become Shocked If Any One Even Watch This Torture For Only One Minute Also, 0% Of Comedy Only A Sense Less Person Can Laugh At This Jokes, No Humour And Full Of Over Acting 🤬🤬🤬
I think this movie was great! My friends and I enjoyed watching it together. I 100% recommend it.

After watching this movie I want to take Suicide never experienced such type of terrible movie even this movie is not make any sense it's a total time waste movie we can't see this movie not for critically and also not for entertainment purposes.

Aside from being a completely unnecessary sequel, "Student of the Year 2" is just a plain bad movie in many ways. The story feels completely uninspired and the movie is devoid of any real heart and soul the first movie had. The first movie is far from a great movie, but I still found some enjoyment in it because I liked the characters and was pretty entertained by the premise. This movie just didn't engage me because it lacked any real focus on what it wanted to be about. The characters are paper-thin, and not particularly likable. I will say the one good thing about the movie is that it unintentionally hilarious at times and it felt like something that was so bad it's good in certain moments. Overall, this movie is a poor representation of what Bollywood can be and is mostly a waste of time.

If this is your idea of what high school drama is, god can only help you. 
This movie turned out to be an even bigger shitshow than I thought, and I had thought the worst. The only reason why anyone could've wanted to watch the movie is because of the immense amount of publication done by the Dharma Group. Tiger Shroff once again went in with the stunts he does everytime, while Ananya Panday and Tara Sutaria were 2 damsels in distress, both in the plot as well as in their acting. Hats off to the producers in making such a disastrous film. Loved it!

I watched the movie and I believe it's not that bad I guess it's like a college web series kinda thing added with some Karan Johar masala😂 but the still same old hero wala concept hai movie ka, I mean it's a good time pass movie kyunke at least the movie let you feel anticipated whether Tiger would go with Ananya or Tara😂😂
Plus poori movie me study aur parhai k ilawa sub kuch hai toh fantasy waala sara scene and aisa lagta hai you are watching a dream rather than some real shit😂
thanks for the beautiful movie :)
the movie was so good and quality was so fresh

It was mildly entertaining as I watched it with a fast-forward button handy. Just wondering though, who saw Punit's past films and thought - someone give this man a bigger budget? With Tiger, the dancing was impressive and the flips same-old, same-old. Tara's character was just shitty, pretty girl gets a total raw deal. And Ananya has spunk, but what sad dancing for a character whose entire ambition in life is to dance.
One of the worst movie that I ever seen it... Now I thinking that why I watched it why.... Please don't see this movie 🙏🙏🙏
Pure garbage and waste of time. what else can you expect from KARAN JOHAR, Shittiest director in Bollywood.
One of my favorite movies
Everything, but Tiger Shroff's dancing is so played out. Try harder dharma productions. Movies like these can make us lose faith in your productions
Set a goal and achieve

The movie has nothing new to offer. While the cast & visuals are enticing to the eyes, the movie falls short in story, acting, and a improper misuse of new comers such as Ananya Pandey or Tara Sutaria, who are unfortunately tied down to such characters that have less dialogue more dance numbers. Tiger Shroff excels in his art of gymnastics and dance, yet it's disappointing to see so much potential go towards a movie that does not do his stardom any justice. His acting skills have matured since Heropanti, but he still has a long way to go. Overall, I was not as invested in this one as the first installment of SOTY
Worth seeing for Tiger Shroff's pecs alone.
I thought the only thing i would love in the movie would be tara but tbh ananya was the only thing among the lead actors which made me happy and the supporting cast which gave us some laughs!
Too torturing to watch in theaters...probably the worst nightmare

Best movie of the year

this was a good movie. some of the acting was a little cheesy, but overall okay. the incorporation of kabbadi as an underlying theme behind the dancing struck a nice balance. the male lead roles exhibited much athleticism, albeit less than top-notch acting. the dynamics of shreya's character (ananya pandey) is the true heart of this movie.
Very entertaining!! The songs are excellent. Tiger Shroff and Ananya Panday stand out. Don't expect too much, just relax and enjoy the movie.
